meanings.definition: A room or building that is used for providing light
meanings.sent1: The lum was filled with sunshine, making the room bright and warm.
meanings.sent2: She turned on the lum to illuminate the dark hallway.
meanings.sent3: The lum was so bright that it seemed like a magical place.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a lum, spreading joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The lum in the library made the books glow with knowledge.

meanings.definition: A unit of luminous flux equal to the amount of light emitted per second in a unit solid angle of one steradian from a uniform source of one candela
meanings.sent1: The lum measurement indicated the brightness of the light source.
meanings.sent2: The lum value helped determine the intensity of the flashlight beam.
meanings.sent3: The lum number on the screen confused the students in physics class.
meanings.sent4: His idea shone like a lum in the darkness of the brainstorming session.
meanings.sent5: The lum of the stars guided them through the night.
